          <title>
            <string language="en">Extracting copper from copper carbonate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Extrahieren kupfern vom kupfernen Karbonat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Extraire de cuivre à partir du carbonate de

            <string language="en">This diagram with labelling shows how copper can be extracted from copper carbonate.</string>
